2019-03-05

Mar 5, 2019

课上老师让造句
欧洲同学：
Swiss people are rich.
US Americans are superficial.
🤣

希望你可以记住我，记住我这样活过，这样在你身边呆过。

——村上春树，《挪威的森林》

Even water has memory that no matter where it ends up, it'll always remember where it's been.
